program.name: Goodgame Empire - Non Incentivized
program.description: <p><b>Browser game</b><br></p><p>Become the lord of a castle and turn your small fortress into the capital of the entire kingdom in this exciting online strategy game. Establish an efficient economic system and assemble a mighty army to defend your realm and extend your territory. Forge alliances with other players worldwide to crush your enemies, and become the sole ruler of a mighty empire!</p><p><span style="font-weight:bold;">Target group</span>: male, between 13 - 35 years</p><span style="font-weight:bold;">Flow:</span> Single Optin: can create avatar but dont have to, fill in username, email address, password, accept T&amp;Cs<br><br><br><span style="font-weight:bold;"></span>

program.name: MundoMe Argentina - Mobile web - ADT
program.restrictions: AR traffic only<br><br>Incentivized/VC/Content locking traffic is NOT allowed.<br><br>&nbsp;<br><br>•&nbsp;&nbsp; Use of the word FREE or GRATIS in the ads or website (The affiliates in no way should communicate or in a way imply through their promotions to the end customer that the services/products are FREE.)&nbsp; Implying by use of similar words that the advertised products are free or at no cost to the customer.<br><br>•&nbsp;&nbsp; Use of brand names in the ads: The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that include brands/logos/trademarks and were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Matomy representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives.<br><br>•&nbsp;&nbsp; Include our landing pages on pages that actually refer to a different campaign. For example it's strictly prohibited to include a landing page for an iPhone on a page that actually advertises a gift fashion voucher and vice versa.<br><br>•&nbsp;&nbsp; Alternating our landing pages in any form, such as shorten them in a way that the footer text isn't shown in full.<br><br>•&nbsp;&nbsp; Changing the users browser settings in order to load one of our landing pages by default.<br><p><span style="font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: 'Lucida Grande', serif; ">any form of SMS marketing is forbidden on our campaigns in any country of the world. If there is 100% solid proof that the used number database is a valid optin database for sms promotion, you need to ask prior permission from us for the promotion for each country where the sms will be sent to.</span></p>

program.name: OLX - GT|ZA - iOS - Non Incent
program.description: <span style="color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);">Start using the #1 Free Classifieds App!</span><br style="color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);"><span style="color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);">The best way to buy and sell 'on the go' and in your local area.</span><p style="border:0px;margin:0px 0px 5px;padding:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);">OLX allows you to easily post your ads for free and search for classified ads in your local area. Whether it is a flat screen TV, mobile phones, electronics, used cars, an apartment to rent, or a second-hand piece of furniture, OLX provides you with millions of buyers and sellers to connect to, all for free!</p><p style="border:0px;margin:0px 0px 5px;padding:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);">• Super simple ad posting: take a picture with your phone camera, describe your ad and sell it.<br>• Easily search and browse for classifieds around you using your phone's location.<br>• Manage your ads, favorites and messages on the go with "My OLX"<br>• Share your ads with everyone through Facebook, Whatsapp, Twitter, etc.</p>
program.countries: AR, BR, CO, CR, EC, SV, GT, IN, KE, NG, ZA

program.description: <p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;"><span style="font-size: 8.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Exur products gives you the opportunity to make money from your home.</span></p><p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 8.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Flow: The user only has to click in the banner, go to the landing page, fill 2 blanks and accept for the pixel to be fired.</span></p><p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 8.5pt;">Read Term and Conditions.</span></p><p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 8.5pt;"><br></span></p><p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 8.5pt;">Los productos de Exur te dan la oportunidad de ganar dinero desde tu casa.</span></p><p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 8.5pt;">Flow: El usuario da click en la landing para llegar al registro, llena 2 campos y al llegar a la thank you page se dispara el pixel.</span></p><p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Leer terminos y condiciones</p>

program.name: NEW Rail Nation International Non Incentivized
program.description: <b>Browser game<br><br></b>Rail Nation combines an in-depth transport simulation with a refines strategy game in charming<br>graphics. As founder of a railroad company the user can turn a sleepy town with historical steam train into a vibrant metropolis with electric railways. It is the players goal to transport as many goods as possible through six historic railroad eras, to interact with other players and to built up their own railroad network. The player has the chance to be the most influential tycoon with the best strategy within the endgame.<br><br><b>User Flow:</b><br>DOI<br>1. The user starts in the www.rail-nation.com<br>home page and clicks on “Register Now”<br>button. After clicking on the button, the<br>system takes him/her to the registration<br>form.<br>2. In the registration form, the user enters a<br>player name, e-mail address and a<br>password. After clicking on the “Register” button, the<br>user is sent an activation e-mail.<br>3. When the user clicks on the link in the<br>activation e-mail, or fills in the activation<br>code on himself, he / she is sent to the<br>website and receives a message that the<br>activation was successful.<br>3.1. The partner tracking pixel is<br>triggered at the moment of<br>activation.<br>The relevant entry can be found in<br>the source code for the HTML<br>page.<b><br><br>Target group:</b><br>- Player type: casual and core games,<br>- Gender distribution: 10% female, 90% male,<br>- Age group: 24-50 years old,<br>- Genre:<br><ul><li>Simulation/strategy</li></ul>- Similar games:<br><ul><li>Forge of Empires,</li><li>Anno Online,</li><li>Trainstation,</li><li>Skyrama,</li><li>The Settlers Online,</li></ul>- Literature &amp; Films:<br><ul><li>Around the world in 80 days,</li><li>The Time Machine,</li><li>Back to the future series,</li><li>The talking of Pelham 1, 2, 3,&nbsp;</li></ul><p><br></p><br>
program.restrictions: <span style="color:rgb(102,102,102);background-color:rgb(255,255,255);">Traffic only allowed from countries set as campaigns!</span><br>Please note: publishers have to cap to 100€/day/campaign&nbsp;<br><br><p style="margin:0px;padding:0px;color:rgb(102,102,102);"><span style="margin:0px;padding:0px;background-color:rgb(255,255,255);">Only affiliates who agreed to Travian addendum can access the links!&nbsp;Here's the link for the addendum -</span></p><p style="margin:0px;padding:0px;color:rgb(102,102,102);"></p><p style="margin:0px;padding:0px;color:rgb(102,102,102);"><span style="margin:0px;padding:0px;color:rgb(31,73,125);">http://mockup.tsxnrey.com/9096-Travian_publisher_addendum_20101015.DOC</span></p><br>Geo´s and payout list:<u>http://www.tsxnrey.com/i/Sandra/Sandra/Rail%20Nation%20Int%c2%b4l_Updated%20Payouts.pdf</u><br><br>
